entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one who sent a furry brown wallet to Harry.

entities.name: d.a.
entities.description: D.A. is mentioned as part of Hagrid's plans for Harry.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks gave a small, working model of a Firebolt to Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron gave an enormous box of Every-Flavor Beans to Harry.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley and Mrs. Weasley gave a hand-knitted jumper and some mince pies to Harry.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as part of the couple who gave gifts to Harry.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby gave a painting to Harry.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred Apparated at the foot of Harry's bed.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George Apparated at the foot of Harry's bed.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy sent back something to his family, causing his mother to cry again.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and recipient of gifts.

relationships.description: Hagrid has plans for D.A. that involve Harry.
Tonks gave a small, working model of a Firebolt to Harry.
Ron gave an enormous box of Every-Flavor Beans to Harry.
Mr. Weasley and Mrs. Weasley gave a hand-knitted jumper to Harry.
Dobby gave a painting to Harry.
Fred Apparated at the foot of Harry's bed.
George Apparated at the foot of Harry's bed.
Percy sent back something to his family, causing his mother to cry again.
